p: Monthly prevalence values of CHIKV-IgG in populations #2â€“5 are presented in Fig 3 for Guadeloupe and Martinique. This covers the period from Aug-1 st 2013 to Jan-31 st 2015 and includes both results from a prospective study (starting at the end of Feb-2014) and a retrospective study (Aug-2013 to Feb-2014) limited to Martinique.
